p: The number of positive cases among those tested was 11/30 (36.6%) in 2016, 18/64 (28.1%) in 2017 and 10/56 (17.8%) in 2018; the 3 cases tested between 2011 and 2016 were all negative. Of the positive cases, 61.5% (24/39) had been vaccinated with a leptospiral vaccine within 12â€‰months and 53.8% (21/39) had received antibiotic therapy prior to referral.
